questions.text: How does Michael get to work in the morning?
questions.explanation:
On his bike.

	With the recent heat wave, Michael has found that riding his bike from the model home to the office has been very difficult.  Since he's tired and sweaty at work, the bike is becoming a large hassle, so he decides he needs a car.

questions.text: Who hasn't been driving George Sr.'s car?
questions.explanation:
Michael.

	Gob nearly sets fire to the car while passing through a security gate at Lucille's apartment building.  He tells Michael to use the stairs car he wants everyone to drive, but Tobias accidentally brought the stairs car onto an airport tarmac and held up the flights.Lindsay ends up spilling a bottle of nail polish on the car, but worries only because the colour was discontinued.

questions.correct: A frozen chocolate banana with all of the toppings
options: A banana with nuts and salt
A chocolate covered pretzel with banana flavoured icing
A banana dipped in honey with nuts and raisins
questions.explanation:
A frozen chocolate banana with all of the toppings.

	When Gob goes to the banana stand, he asks for a Gob, and when George Michael tries to make it, he ends up needing two sticks to support the weight of it.  Gob doesn't like to talk about money with George Michael, so he never pays for his bananas.

questions.text: What calendar did Lindsay once pose for?
questions.explanation:
Ladies of Literacy.

	Lindsay begins complaining that Michael is power-hungry and that he never does any volunteer work.  When Michael asks of her volunteering, she brings up the calendar, and although it promoted literacy, it was banned in schools because of its sexual content.

questions.text: Who thinks that Buster is in love with them?
questions.correct: Lucille & Lucille Austero & Lucile & Lucile Austero
questions.explanation:
Lucille & Lucille Austero & Lucile & Lucile Austero.

	After he unknowingly flirted with Lucille Austero at a Spanish awards show in the episode "Key Decisions", Buster is now afraid to be in his mother's apartment.  Lucille Austero (aka Lucille 2) keeps calling Buster to go see "The Producers" with her because she got tickets from Lucille (Bluth).  The only reason that Lucille gave Lucille 2 the tickets was to keep her from going to a charity bachelorette auction.

questions.text: How did Gob get his tooth whistle?
options: Hitting the steering wheel with his face
Opening a beer bottle with his teeth
questions.explanation:
Biting into a candy apple.

	After being forced to leave the Bluth banana stand with no banana, he decided to get a candy apple at a different vendor, but he was surprised to wreck a tooth by biting it.  Every once in a while on the show, Gob talks with an annoying little whistle that Michael sarcastically comments is unnoticeable.

questions.text: What does Lindsay kill in the wetlands?
questions.explanation:
A frog.

	Lindsay decides to prove to Michael that she is charitable, so she decides to help clean up the wetlands before the bachelorette auction.  After hanging up her phone, Lindsay slams her garbage poker into a frog and decides that she doesn't care for the wetlands.

questions.text: Who is sent to the permits office first to switch the files?
questions.explanation:
Gob.

	After making a deal with Gob, Michael gets him to switch the files at the permits office posing as a deliveryman.  Gob tries to be unnoticeable, but his new tooth whistle keeps giving him away.

questions.text: Who goes with George Michael to the permits office after the first person fails at their attempt?
questions.explanation:
Maeby.

	Maeby decides to leave her calling card (a wad of gum) on the file bureau and she tells George Michael that they'll probably find out that they were there anyways because of their fingerprints.  George Michael begins to freak out when workers nearly find them, but he decides to take the blame.

questions.text: Who does Buster bid on at the charity auction?
questions.explanation:
Lucille Austero.

	After waiting for Lucille 2 to leave her apartment, he heads to the charity auction and accidentally bids ten thousand dollars on her.  Michael also bids on Lindsay because of her failed attempt at saving the wetlands.
